posts.title: Today is a great day to eat ramen 🍜📆
posts.author: Steve West

posts.title: How to throw a ramen party 🍜🎉
posts.author: Hugo O'Connor

comments.body: Yep, great day for a ramen!
We should have a ramen party!
I can make the noodles in my pasta maker
The best ramen in Sydney is definitely Gumshara
Yes I agree, though it often puts me in a food coma
